metadata.title: CVE-2024-25448 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the imlib_free_image_and_decache function of imlib2 v1.9.1allows attackers to cause a heap buffer overflow via parsing a craftedimage.

criterions.comment: imlib2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
